statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining;
SELECT employee_name, certification_type FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_valid_until >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT DISTINCT certification_type FROM EmployeeTraining;
SELECT certification_type, COUNT(*) as certification_count FROM EmployeeTraining GROUP BY certification_type;
SELECT employee_name, compliance_requirement FROM EmployeeTraining ORDER BY compliance_requirement DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining ORDER BY certification_date ASC, certification_valid_until DESC;
SELECT certification_type, certification_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE compliance_requirement LIKE '%ISO%' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, certification_type, certification_valid_until FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_valid_until < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_type FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_certifications, certification_type FROM EmployeeTraining GROUP BY certification_type HAVING total_certifications > 1;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE certification='Java';
SELECT * FROM compliance_requirements WHERE due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM compliance_requirements ORDER BY req_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, certification FROM employees WHERE certification_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, certification, certification_date FROM employees WHERE certification = 'Certified' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE certification = 'Certified' AND certification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, certification, certification_date FROM employees WHERE certification LIKE 'CI%' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE certification = 'Expired' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, certification FROM employees GROUP BY certification HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE certification = 'PMP';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM training_courses WHERE duration_hours > 20;
SELECT requirement_name, due_date FROM compliance_requirements ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, certification FROM employees WHERE certification_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE certification = 'Project Management Professional'
SELECT id, name, certification_date FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT * FROM training_courses WHERE duration_hours > 20 AND location = 'Online'
SELECT instructor, location FROM training_courses WHERE duration_hours <= 10
SELECT requirement_name, due_date FROM compliance_requirements WHERE due_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY due_date ASC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM certifications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_type FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, training_name, trainer FROM employees JOIN training ON employees.department = training.training_type;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id JOIN certifications ON employee_certifications.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING total_employees > 5;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM Certifications;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_description FROM TrainingPrograms ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE certification_id = 1;

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, ec.issue_date FROM Employees e INNER JOIN EmployeeCertifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id INNER JOIN Certifications c ON ec.certification_id = c.certification_id;
SELECT et.employee_id, tp.program_name, et.training_date FROM EmployeeTraining et INNER JOIN TrainingPrograms tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id;

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, ec.issue_date, ec.expiration_date FROM Employees e INNER JOIN EmployeeCertifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id INNER JOIN Certifications c ON ec.certification_id = c.certification_id WHERE e.employee_id = 1;
